channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Need a break from election angst? Here’s what’s worth streaming in November
Nvidia wants South Korea’s SK hynix to work faster in face of global shortage of crucial advanced AI chips
item.description: Nvidia's chief executive, Jensen Huang, made the request amid a global shortage of crucial advanced chips, which SK has pledged to work on with fellow...

item.title: Viking Therapeutics stock jumps after ‘great’ trial of weight-loss drug
France tells China that negotiation over brandy tariffs is still possible as French cognac makers say they’re ‘hostages’ in EV trade spat
item.description: Beijing in October announced provisional tariffs on European Union brandy imports, part of an escalating trade row between Beijing and Brussels.

item.title: Vietnam real estate tycoon sentenced to death for $27 billion fraud begins appeal of ‘too severe and harsh’ sentence
item.description: Tens of thousands of people who had invested their savings in Saigon Commercial Bank lost money, shocking the communist nation and prompting rare prot...

item.title: Ryanair profit tumbles—CEO Michael O’Leary points finger at ‘staffing issues and further Boeing delays’
item.description: The company posted an after-tax profit of 1.4 billion euros ($1.6 billion) for the second quarter, a six-percent drop from the same period last year.

item.title: Dow futures steady while bonds rally on signs of closer election
Here’s how stock-market investors can cut through Harris-Trump election noise
OPEC extends oil output cuts through the end of December
Election Day: Here’s what to watch for as Kamala Harris and Donald Trump prepare to make history
item.description: The election is a true toss-up between Democrat Kamala Harris and Republican Donald Trump.
